original_title: 悪戯に教師を挑発する生徒のひかりをホテルに閉じ込めて膣内から溢れ出るほど何度も中出ししてやった。
overview: 25 years as a teacher. I'm almost 50 and still single. Before I knew it, I had come to see female students as sexual objects. Among them, there is a student that I particularly like. Her name is Hikari Ninomiya. But she seems to have noticed my gaze... She told me to keep quiet and raise my grades. In my 25 years as a teacher, I have never been so fooled by a student. … something broke inside me.
title: Hikari, A Student Who Provokes The Teacher To Mischief, Was Confined In The Hotel And got So Many vaginal cumshots that It Overflowed. Hikari Ninomiya
